tool_description: Monitors image quality metrics in real-time during acquisition and provides immediate feedback on technical parameters.

image_series_id.description: Unique identifier for the image series being monitored

quality_threshold.description: Quality score threshold (0-100) for acceptable images

error_messages: Invalid image series ID: The specified image series ID does not exist.
Quality monitoring unavailable: Real-time quality monitoring is not available for this image type.
Quality threshold exceeded: Image quality has fallen below the specified threshold.
Monitoring system error: The quality monitoring system has encountered an error.
Invalid quality threshold: Quality threshold must be between 0 and 100.
usage: Provide image_series_id and optionally set quality_threshold to monitor image quality during acquisition.

current_quality_score.description: Current quality score (0-100) for the image series

quality_acceptable.description: Whether the current image quality meets the threshold

recommendations.description: Recommendations for improving image quality if needed
